@zyle1992 wrote:

public int getKeyCode(char c) {
    return (int) c;// The (int) isn't necessary, but it makes what you're trying to accomplish clearer.
}

item.title: [Java] Convert key to keystate?
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

My initial idea was:

public int convertKeyToState(String key){ if(key.equalsIgnoreCase("x")){ return 44; } return 0; }
Which I CAN do, but it will take forever getting all of the keys, is there a method I can use to convert a key to a keystate by the letter on they key?

Read full topic
